lines.text: I will bring the whole edifice down on their unworthy heads

[voiceover]
I am the man with the power to create catastrophe.

[his first meeting with Zonfeld]
I have a "gift" for disaster.
You seem to have survived it.
I don't mean for me, I mean for others.

[sees Brunel]
Oh, Inspector Brunel, what a pain in the derrière you're being.

[describing Morlar to Brunel]
Most of my patients find the world too much for them. He was too much for the world.
What am I? How can I will death?
